A Copy of a Mini Bookdown Siobhan McCarthy 1 Create your open textbook Hello, world!!!

2 Introduction This is an introduction to the Mini Bookdown Template! 2.1 Questionable Decisions Did you know that trying to manage tutorials and assignments in a Git/GitHub class is very challenging if you’ve never done anything coding related before? Apparently yes! Who could have predicted that. 2.2 Potential Seems like it might still be useful for documentation if we’re trying to get away from Google Docs.
3 Chapter One: Away from Google Docs 3.1 Consistency 3.2 Tables 3.3 Formatting

3 Chapter One: Away from Google Docs The problem with Google Docs is that some people just can’t be trusted with a rich text editor. 3.1 Consistency In documentation, one should really use a single font. 3.2 Tables Almost as poor form as iFrames are to modern HTML. 3.3 Formatting When different people prefer to emphasize with bold, italics, or ++underlining++, it gets messy.
